name: Azure_Audit_WebApp_Registered_With_AzureAD
display_name: Azure Audit WebApp Registered With AzureAD
description: This policy audits whether WebApp is registered with AzureAD. Managed service identity in App Service makes the app more secure by eliminating secrets from the app, such as credentials in the connection strings. When registering with Azure Active Directory in the app service, the app will connect to other Azure services securely without the need of username and passwords

recommendation.name: Azure_Audit_WebApp_Registered_With_AzureAD
recommendation.description: It is recommended that Web App is registered with Azure Active Directory.
